dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...I mean, come on, that's what you call a president standing up for, uh, law and order, right? Praising those brave citizens in Portland, you know, who quelled that riot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...I mean, come on, that's what you call a president standing up for, uh, law and order, right? Praising those brave citizens in Portland, you know, who quelled that riot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest and declared paint is not bullets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Law and order? No, no, no. He's, he's celebrating vigilantism, Host_A! Glorifying a, like, a 17-year-old with a rifle, uh, in Kenosha. That's not heroic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Law and order? No, no, no. He's, he's celebrating vigilantism, Host_A! Glorifying a, like, a seventeen-year-old with a rifle, uh, in Kenosha. That's not heroic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about Rittenhouse, Trump called it an interesting situation, and claimed Rittenhouse was trying to get away from protesters who violently attacked him, asserting, without evidence, that Rittenhouse probably would've been killed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He defended himself! And others! It's right there, the article says it, against, like, violent agitators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He defended himself! And others! It's right there, the article says it, against, like, violent agitators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about Rittenhouse, Trump called it an interesting situation, and claimed Rittenhouse was trying to get away from protesters who violently attacked him, asserting, without evidence, that Rittenhouse probably would've been killed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Biden offers what, a limp condemnation? Please.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Biden offers what, a limp condemnation? Please.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Limp condemnation? He said rioting is bad, which, you know, is bad. But Trump's out there calling them "socialist mobs" and "Antifa terrorists." It’s just inflaming things!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Limp condemnation? He said rioting is bad, which, you know, is bad. But Trump's out there calling them socialist mobs and Antifa terrorists. It's just inflaming things!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden offered a stern condemnation of protest violence in his speech, declaring rioting is not protesting... Trump campaign advisor Jason Miller hitting Biden for not specifically mentioning radical left-wing groups like Antifa in his blanket denunciation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Inflaming? He's pointing out the truth! These are, uh, radical leftist groups, Host_B. And Biden, he wouldn't even mention the heroism of the good guys.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Inflaming? He's pointing out the truth! These are, uh, radical leftist groups, Host_B. And Biden, he wouldn't even mention the heroism of the good guys.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the statement, Biden urged Trump to join me in saying that while peaceful protest is a right a necessity violence is wrong, period. No matter who does it, no matter what political affiliation they have. Period

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The "good guys?" You mean the ones who, um, shoot people? And he's going to Kenosha to congratulate them? It's irresponsible, the governor asked him to stay away.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The good guys? You mean the ones who, um, shoot people? And he's going to Kenosha to congratulate them? It's irresponsible, the governor asked him to stay away.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Trump is slated to travel to Kenosha on Tuesday to survey the damage from the protests, despite Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers urging him not to.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He's going to Kenosha because they did a good job! The National Guard intervention! He's, you know, supporting the true American heroes who defended themselves, Host_B. Concrete evidence he saved lives!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's going to Kenosha because they did a good job! The National Guard intervention! He's, you know, supporting the true American heroes who defended themselves, Host_B. Concrete evidence he saved lives!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kenosha is something we did a good job on, Trump said, citing the national guard intervention... asserting, without evidence, that Rittenhouse probably would've been killed.

dialogue_turns.text: Concrete evidence? Seriously? And Biden, he, like, asked, "Do I look like a radical socialist who condones violence?" He's trying to de-escalate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Concrete evidence? Seriously? And Biden, he, like, asked, Do I look like a radical socialist who condones violence? He's trying to de-escalate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ask yourself: Do I look to you like a radical socialist with a soft spot for rioters? Really? Biden asked during his speech, in contrast with Trumps claim that he would surrender to the left wing mob.

dialogue_turns.text: De-escalate? No, he's, he's repeating the monstrous lie that these were legitimate protests! He's giving, uh, communist revolutionaries the policy agenda they want!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: De-escalate? No, he's, he's repeating the monstrous lie that these were legitimate protests! He's giving, uh, communist revolutionaries the policy agenda they want!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That sentiment was echoed by Trump, who spent much of his White House briefing taking shots at Democrats, claiming Biden didnt mention the far-left and accusing him of repeating the monstrous lie that these are peaceful protests.

dialogue_turns.text: No, he's saying Antifa's actions are wrong, period! He’s asking Trump to join him. If he can't, he's unfit, uh, to be president. That's Biden's point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, he's saying Antifa's actions are wrong, period! He's asking Trump to join him. If he can't, he's unfit, uh, to be president. That's Biden's point.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bidens remarks were met with immediate dissatisfaction from the Trump team, with Trump campaign advisor Jason Miller hitting Biden for not specifically mentioning radical left-wing groups like Antifa in his blanket denunciation.

dialogue_turns.text: He's unfit? Trump called Rittenhouse a true American hero! Biden's too weak, too scared, to stand with the real patriots, Host_B. That's the issue.

dialogue_turns.text: Real patriots? He's promoting, like, chaos and division! And what about the Trump Organization being sued, huh? Maybe he should focus on that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Real patriots? He's promoting, like, chaos and division! And what about the Trump Organization being sued, huh? Maybe he should focus on that!
